hero.title: Meet the {website.name} Team
hero.subtitle: We're a passionate group of innovators, former athletes, and technologists dedicated to revolutionizing sports performance.

mission.title: Who We Are
mission.description: At {website.name}, our team combines expertise in sports, technology, and user experience to build tools that empower athletes and coaches worldwide. We're driven by a shared love for competition and a commitment to making sports analysis accessible, intuitive, and impactful.

items.title: Emily Carter
items.description: Emily, a former national field hockey player, co-founded {website.name} to bring cutting-edge technology to every locker room. With 12 years in sports tech startups, she’s focused on giving every athlete access to pro-level tools.

items.title: David Li
items.description: David leads our engineering division with over two decades of experience in AI systems and scalable software. His passion for transforming raw data into actionable insights drives our product innovation.

items.title: Isabella Rossi
items.description: Isabella, a former professional volleyball coach, designs features that align perfectly with coaches’ workflows. Her deep understanding of both sports and UX ensures {website.name} stays intuitive and powerful.

items.title: Omar Khalid
items.description: Omar manages operations across {primaryColor1}180+ countries{primaryColor1}, ensuring a smooth experience for every user. His background in global logistics and sports marketing fuels our worldwide reach.

items.title: Chloe Nguyen
items.description: Chloe leads our customer success team with the same energy she brought as a collegiate track and field athlete. She ensures every user gets personalized support and maximizes their results on {website.name}.

items.title: Lucas Andrade
items.description: Lucas designs our AI-driven performance tracking algorithms. With expertise in computer vision and predictive analytics, he makes identifying key plays and trends effortless for coaches.

team.title: Our Culture
team.description: At {website.name}, we foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and passion for sports. Our diverse team works together to push boundaries, celebrate wins, and support each other like a true team. Join us in shaping the future of sports technology—check our careers page for open roles.
